Package it.seba.juno.model

Class PlayersModel

java.lang.Object
it.seba.juno.observer.Observable
it.seba.juno.model.PlayersModel
public class PlayersModel extends Observable
The model for the players of the game, the instance of this class isn't directly serialized to disk like options model, instead are serialized to disk all players profile.
Author:
Sebastian Rapetti
